title: Revamping of the entire building complex of the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Minister of Education to obtain a status report, after having examined the entire building complex of the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka and to award the contracts using the National Competitive Bidding System in regard to the constructions relevant to the identified priority renovations and the relevant consultancy services to the Central Engineering Consultancy Bureau, was approved by the Cabinet.
